reviewText: PRETTY GOOD; and that not very hard work is easy job and also has showing view more pictures what she had made. She is a good art craft and carvings. Good Carrie Dearing ...

So many good tips in this DVD.  Besides walking you through each step in the process Carrie gives pointers on how best to use each technique employed in making these beautiful bowls.  Little asides are priceless.  Carrie is fun to watch - she loves to teach and it shows. And yes, you WILL be able to make a beautiful bowl by the end of the DVD.  I highly recommend it.
